name: video_post_metadata
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_data.
Tool description: Social Media Data API in Real-Time.   -Get very useful and unique information.  -I'm on Telegram https://t.me/logicBuilder News and announcements Telegram Channel https://t.me/logicApi
API description: Fetch metadata for a single TikTok video post.

video.description: The URL of the TikTok video post. For example: 'https://www.tiktok.com/@charlidamelio/video/7137423965982592302'.

fresh.description: By setting this query value to **1** you can force to return fresh data(not cached)
